## Source: ossf-package-analysis (036de74aa3f36e7c65b0ae918b5cbc8dad256bac711320dbded5935ef0d48657)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'arm-package-deploymentscripts-2019-10-preview' @ 8.0.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
